name: Ray Hill (Blair Gorman)
what_you_do: Blair Gorman operates Numerologist.com, providing personalized numerology and astrology reports, forecasts, video readings, and numerological guidance.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking personal guidance, life direction, and self-discovery through numerology and astrology.
social_proof: Master Numerologist and NLP Master Practitioner with 26 years of practicing numerology; Bachelor of Science degree.
signature_programs: Free Numerology Reading; personalized video readings (life path, true path, finding spark, overcoming obstacles)
business_focus: Providing personalized numerology and astrology insights to help individuals understand their life path and personal numbers.
service_provided: personalized numerology reports, astrology reports, video readings, free numerology reading, life path analysis
